languages.text: "Мне дурно от одной мысли, сколько невинных погибло в муках — а ты этим восхищаешься!"
"It makes me sick to think how many innocents died in agony — and you marvel at it!"
languages.original_text: "Мне дурно от одной мысли, сколько невинных погибло в муках — а ты этим восхищаешься!"

traits.locale_text: "It makes me sick to think how many innocents died in agony — and you marvel at it!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It makes me sick to think how many innocents died in agony — and you marvel at it!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It makes me sick to think how many innocents died in agony — and you marvel at it!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It makes me sick to think how many innocents died in agony — and you marvel at it!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “一想到有多少无辜的人在痛苦中死去，我就觉得恶心！可你居然对此惊叹不已！”
languages.original_text: "It makes me sick to think how many innocents died in agony — and you marvel at it!"

traits.locale_text: “一想到有多少无辜的人在痛苦中死去，我就觉得恶心！可你居然对此惊叹不已！”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai envie de vomir chaque fois que je repense à tous ceux qui sont morts dans d'atroces souffrances, mais vous, ça vous émerveille ! »
languages.original_text: "It makes me sick to think how many innocents died in agony — and you marvel at it!"

traits.locale_text: « J'ai envie de vomir chaque fois que je repense à tous ceux qui sont morts dans d'atroces souffrances, mais vous, ça vous émerveille ! »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Me pone enferma pensar en cuántos inocentes han muerto de forma agónica... ¡y mientras, tú te maravillas!».
languages.original_text: "It makes me sick to think how many innocents died in agony — and you marvel at it!"

traits.locale_text: «Me pone enferma pensar en cuántos inocentes han muerto de forma agónica... ¡y mientras, tú te maravillas!».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「大勢の罪なき人々が、苦悩の中に死んでいくなんて考えるのも嫌…あなたも驚いてるでしょう！」
languages.original_text: "It makes me sick to think how many innocents died in agony — and you marvel at it!"

traits.locale_text: 「大勢の罪なき人々が、苦悩の中に死んでいくなんて考えるのも嫌…あなたも驚いてるでしょう！」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Der Gedanke, wie viele Unschuldige qualvoll gestorben sind, widert mich an — und Ihr bewundert es?!"
languages.original_text: "It makes me sick to think how many innocents died in agony — and you marvel at it!"

traits.locale_text: "Der Gedanke, wie viele Unschuldige qualvoll gestorben sind, widert mich an — und Ihr bewundert es?!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "It makes me sick to think how many innocents died in agony — and you marvel at it!"

languages.text: "Kim bilir kaç masum acı içinde öldü. Bu düşünce bana sıkıntılar verirken sizse hayranlıktan gözlerinizi alamıyorsunuz!"
languages.original_text: "It makes me sick to think how many innocents died in agony — and you marvel at it!"

traits.locale_text: "Kim bilir kaç masum acı içinde öldü. Bu düşünce bana sıkıntılar verirken sizse hayranlıktan gözlerinizi alamıyorsunuz!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
